title: COVID-19 Information From Our Experts
description: The extent of the coronavirus outbreak (COVID-19) is rapidly evolving and risk assessment changes daily, but here's what we know about COVID-19 as of today.
cleaned_text: Tips to stay safe and healthy](/forefront/coronavirus-disease-covid-19/covid-flu-qa) Infectious diseases expert Dr. Allison Bartlett explains what to know to stay safe this winter from respiratory illnesses. [How to safely celebrate holidays and avoid respiratory viruses](/forefront/coronavirus-disease-covid-19/holiday-gatherings-safety) Infectious diseases expert Dr. Emily Landon offers recommendations and considerations on how you can celebrate the holiday season safely and avoid respiratory viruses. [The story behind the COVID-19 set-up process: 'I've never seen anything quite like it'](/forefront/coronavirus-disease-covid-19/story-behind-covid-setup-process) UChicago Medicine staff recount how, in record time, they managed to create 7,000 square feet of safe space for COVID-19 testing and treatment in March 2020.
